DatasetGenerators

Class GraphDatasetGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • DatasetGenerators.GraphDatasetGenerator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GraphDatasetGeneratorAllowingMultipleMutations

    public class GraphDatasetGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for creating a generic weighted graph of genotypes from which to generate data sets to be used for the validation of tumor evolution inference methods NOTE: might be interesting to use this as input for other tools TODO add output on STDOUT
    Author:
    redsnic

        public java.lang.String nodeLabel(GenotypeNode node)
        Prints a node referring to mutated genes with their respective HUGO symbols
        Parameters:
        node - the node of which the genotype should be printed REQUIRE not null
        Returns:
        the sequence of HUGO symbols of genes that are mutated in a given genotype
